meanings.sent1: The distichal poem was short and easy to memorize.
meanings.sent2: The distichal structure of the text made it visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: The distichal pattern of the curtains gave the room a neat look.
meanings.sent4: Her distichal handwriting resembled a neatly trimmed hedge.
meanings.sent5: The distichal design of the book cover caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a couplet.
meanings.sent1: The distichal rhyme scheme added a musical quality to the poem.
meanings.sent2: His distichal style of writing was admired by many.
meanings.sent3: The distichal dance moves of the duo were perfectly synchronized.
meanings.sent4: Their distichal banter was entertaining to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The distichal harmony of their voices created a beautiful melody.
